meanings.definition: Not able to be categorized or classified.
meanings.sent1: The strange creature was truly uncategorizable in the eyes of the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unique style was so uncategorizable that critics struggled to define it.
meanings.sent3: The uncategorizable behavior of the toddler left the babysitter puzzled but amused.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an uncategorizable whirlwind, impossible to pin down.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious object in the museum was truly uncategorizable, baffling all who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The uncategorizable music genre blended elements from various styles seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The novel's plot was so uncategorizable that it kept readers guessing until the end.
meanings.sent3: The uncategorizable fashion trend caught on unexpectedly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her uncategorizable talent for storytelling was unmatched in the literary world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's uncategorizable paintings challenged viewers to see beyond traditional labels.
